name: Clash of Wild Dino Hunter
description:
Clash of Wild Dino Hunter

Hunting wild jungle animals is fun when one is a professional hunter as an amateur will endanger his life in trying to kill furious beasts.
Become the ultimate dinosaur hunter. Come out fighting in this high action hunting simulator. Choose your standard hunting rifle or you may decide to use the long range sniper rifle.

In this epic game the dinosaurs are not extinct. These dinosaurs are as real. Become a ultimate dinosaur hunter, catch your prey!
In order to survive in this dangerous and breathtaking terrain, inhabited by the dinosaurs, with each passing level you provided with a new potent weapon.
You are a hunter or prey in this exciting dinosaur hunter game? Play and you will find out.
You have to select one animal at a time and then go into the levels which are five in number.

Game Features:

- Immersive hunting missions to complete
- Realistic 3D graphics and awesome sound effects
- Dozens of real world weapons and upgrades
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Game play is simple yet entertaining.
